thread.title: Manchester United’s Juan Mata should have been sent off for his reckless and out of control challenge on Jamie Vardy
thread.title_full: Manchester United’s Juan Mata should have been sent off for his reckless and out of control challenge on Jamie Vardy

author: tgannon
title: Manchester United’s Juan Mata should have been sent off for his reckless and out of control challenge on Jamie Vardy
text:
EFL Mark Halsey Manchester United’s Juan Mata should have been sent off for his reckless and out of control challenge on Jamie Vardy 
Referee Anthony Taylor had a great view of the challenge and I cannot understand why he did not produce a red card Exclusive
